page.title: 12LANGUAGE SPOKEN
page.content: {Rossendale Dialect } Nowt= Nothing,Whatter=water,Civvy= see you, Toneght=tonight, O'er=over Wod=would, Owd=old, Bin=been, Fer=for,Breyk o'day=break of day, Twinklin=twinkling, Singin=singing, Tek=take, Yor=your, T'day=today, Swoopin=swooping, O'=of, T'=the, An'=and,Towd=told,Showlders=shoulders. {School Slang Words.} Ace=very good,Fab=fabulous,Brill= brilliant,Wiff=smell,Loo=toilet,Cock= the strongest,Pewk=sick. {Urdu/Bangladeshi Language. } As salam Alaikum=Peace be upon you, Waleykum us salam=And on you too be peace, Thank you=shukria,Goodbye=cudda hafiz, Eid Mubarack=Happy Eid, (Eid is the muslim feast day), Please=mehrbani, Welcome=cush amdid.
